attributes.action: give schools even longer school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a teacher I feel I need more time away from school, to re-group and to just take it easy from the early mornings and late nights that are associated with getting a single lesson prepared prepared.

And I'm sure the students would like a longer holiday too.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Extra-holidays/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
